alert.note: Alert for Butte County Area; Northern Foot Hills; Perkins County; West Central Plains; Ziebach County (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 20 at 2:14PM MDT until October 20 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHEAST WYOMING AND MUCH OF NORTHWEST SOUTH DAKOTA... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PARTS OF NORTHEAST WYOMING AND FAR SOUTHWEST SOUTH DAKOTA... .Warm, dry, and breezy weather will continue into early this evening. Combined with dry fuels, this will produce a period of critical fire weather conditions across much of the area. Critical fire weather conditions will then redevelop Friday over parts of northeast WY and far southwest SD. A Red Flag Warning has been issued for these areas. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 318, 323, 327, 328, 329, AND 330... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 318 Wyoming Black Hills, 323 Northern Foot Hills, 327 Butte County Area, 328 Perkins County, 329 West Central Plains and 330 Ziebach County. * WINDS...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Butte County Area; Northern Foot Hills; Perkins County; West Central Plains; Ziebach County
